definition: A formal evaluation or assessment of knowledge, skills, or abilities, typically conducted to determine one's proficiency or competence in a particular subject or field. It is commonly used in educational contexts, such as exams or tests, to measure a person's understanding and performance.

examples.german: Die Prüfungsergebnisse werden nächste Woche bekannt gegeben.
examples.english: The exam results will be announced next week.

examples.german: Er hat die Prüfung nicht bestanden.
examples.english: He did not pass the exam.
The exam preparation was very time-consuming.
